article:
'Audit Bureau of Circulations' or 'ABC' is an international federation of
bureaux comprising member organisations in each country.

When discussed in the context of each country, the bureau may refer to:

* Audit Bureau of Circulations (Australia)
* Audit Bureau of Circulations (Hong Kong)
* Audit Bureau of Circulations (India)
* Alliance for Audited Media, formerly known as Audit Bureau of Circulations
  (North America)
* Audit Bureau of Circulations (UK)
